const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "mapping5",
  role_templates: [
    {
      template: {
        source: "{{#tojson}}groups{{/tojson}}",
      },
      format: "json",
    },
  ],
  rules: {
    field: {
      "realm.name": "saml1",
    },
  },
  enabled: true,
});
console.log(response);
